sentence.Network_en: The hunter walked slowly in the forest, followed by his wolframite.
sentence.Network_cn: 猎人在森林里慢慢地走着, 后面跟着他的狼狗.

sentence.Network_en: Thermodynamic analysis shows that wolframite not only can be decompose.
sentence.Network_cn: 热力学分析结果表明:黑钨矿既可以被酸分解,又可以被碱分解.

sentence.Network_en: The development of main mineral processing technologies of wolframite and scheelite are presented in the paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 论文分别介绍了黑、白钨选矿工艺主要技术进展情况.

list.abs: this paper analyzed the behaviour of tungsten and arsenic contamination factor in phosphorous-arsenic slag under the condition of pressure digestion with NaOH for wolframite concentrate .分析了在黑钨精矿碱压煮条件下，磷砷渣中钨和污染因子砷的行为。

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral consisting of iron-manganese tungstate in crystalline form; the principal ore of tungsten; found in quartz veins associated with granitic rocks
